sense.def: Pathological Condition Pathological Mechanism referring to obstructions caused by wind qi. Tai ping sheng hui fang 太平聖惠方 45 Recipe Entry xi jiao san 犀角散 , powder with xi jiao : 治脚氣 , 春夏防發，稍覺風壅氣滯，臟腑不通， 心神煩悶，脚膝時疼，宜服犀角散方 , “Cures leg qi, prevents outbreaks in spring and autumn. There is a slight sensation of wind obstruction and qi sluggishness. The depots and palaces are no longer penetrable. Heart and spirit experience vexation with pressure. Legs and knees hurt at times. In such cases the recipe to ingest the powder with xi jiao is appropriate”.
